Articles.Content: So I want to expand my space station with some stock-like parts.  Are any mods particularly requested? I see Nertea has a mod in this line, but it does not appear to be 1.0.5 ready yet.  And I would like to know what people recommend, based on their experiences? Thanks!
I've been using Nertea's mod with 1.0.5, and haven't observed any problems.   Not quite the same thing as the programmer announcing it's fully compatible, but I think it's safe to give it a go.

NF just released a 1.0.5 version.
 

Also check out:  
- WildBlue DSEV  (hex trusses and fuel tanks, that will fit into each other if you want).
- Cx Station Parts, for ISS module replicas
- NF Construction and station parts are on my favorites list as well.

Pics of DSEV/ProceduralParts/Cx station:

Spoiler

- Stock gigantor panels at 400% using TweakScale
- DSEV trusses with ProcParts tanks inside
- Cx hab/science/gym modules
- ATV with ProcParts and NF prop/electrical

 

 

Edited December 26, 2015 by Jimbodiah

This... Everyone of those....
I hope Sumghai comes back with a release of FusTek for 1.1... (Here's hoping)

If you play career or science mode, theres this, which gives more purpose to stations:

StationScience
